pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Conditional Visualization for Supervised and Unsupervised Models in Shiny // Constructs a shiny app function with interactive displays for conditional visualization of models, data and density functions. An extended version of package 'condvis'. Catherine B. Hurley, Mark O'Connell,Katarina Domijan (2021) doi:10.1080/10618600.2021.1983439.
